trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event to implement a navigation progress bar for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> control similar to the one in Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件以实现的导航进度条<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>控件类似于 Internet Explorer 中的一个。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs.CurrentProgress%2A> property to determine the number of bytes that have been downloaded successfully.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs.CurrentProgress%2A>属性以确定已成功下载的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs.MaximumProgress%2A> property to determine the number of bytes available for downloading.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs.MaximumProgress%2A>属性来确定可供下载的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> named `WebBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>名为`WebBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes that are loaded already.
trans-unit.target: 已加载的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The total number of bytes to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 要加载的总字节数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of bytes that have been downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 获取已下载的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes that have been loaded or -1 to indicate that the download has completed.
trans-unit.target: 已加载的字节数，或者为 -1 以指示下载已完成。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display the current navigation progress in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性来显示在当前的导航进度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs.MaximumProgress%2A> property to determine the total number of bytes available for downloading.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs.MaximumProgress%2A>属性来确定总可供下载的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser> named `WebBrowser1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser>名为`WebBrowser1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of bytes in the document being loaded.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在加载的文档中的总字节数。

trans-unit.source: The total number of bytes to be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 要加载的总字节数。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display the current navigation progress in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此属性来显示在当前的导航进度<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBar>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs.CurrentProgress%2A> property to determine the number of bytes that have been downloaded successfully.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowserProgressChangedEventArgs.CurrentProgress%2A>属性以确定已成功下载的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.ProgressChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。
